title: Bicameral legislatures in Russia, Mexico, Nigeria

content.question: The political systems of Mexico, Nigeria, and Russia all have

choices.label: effective independent judiciaries with judicial review
unitary systems with strong states and a weak central government
bicameral legislatures based partly on regions and partly on population

content.answer: bicameral legislatures based partly on regions and partly on population

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
